description:
8.102 replaygain
ReplayGain scanner filter. This filter takes an audio stream as an input and
outputs it unchanged.
At end of filtering it displays track_gain and track_peak.

The filter accepts the following exported read-only options:

track_gain.description: Exported track gain in dB at end of stream.

track_peak.description: Exported track peak at end of stream.

name: replaygain

parameters.description: Exported track gain in dB at end of stream.
parameters.name: track_gain

parameters.description: Exported track peak at end of stream.
parameters.name: track_peak
